creator: slamb@slamb.org
text:
Subversion <http://subversion.tigris.org> keeps its revision history in a .svn
directory and a cache of all the source files. Lots of tasks (javac, junit)
choke on these cache files, thinking they are source.

An exclude solves this. I'd like to see "**/.svn/**" and "**/.svn" added to the
default excludes, analagous to (but even more important than) the existing
"**/CVS/**" and "**/CVS".

creator: slamb@slamb.org
text:
Created attachment 2244
Patch to do so

Patched into the 1.5 branch (anticipating Subversion's importance to increase
a lot before Ant 1.6 will be released).
creator: bodewig@apache.org
